source@src<js>
result = `<video src="${result}" width="100%" height="280px" controls="controls" ></video>`;
result = `<html><head><meta charset="utf-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1,minimum-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no" /><style>html,body{background-color:black;margin:0;padding:0;width:100%;}</style></head><body>${result}</body></html>`
</js>
